channel.item:
The Real Star of Phantasm http://tobyblog.com/posts/the-real-star-of-phantasm/ Fri, 19 Sep 2014 22:43:00 +0000 (Toby Marks) http://tobyblog.com/posts/the-real-star-of-phantasm/

Here you go, folks, the real star of Phantasm — that bad-ass muscle car! A real thing of beauty, and I’m not even that much of a car guy.
